content.description:
Questions 18-22 are based on an excerpt from a choral work that will be played four times. Before listening to the excerpt for the first time, please look at the text of the excerpt, printed below, and read Questions 18-22.
Blessed are the men who fear Him;They ever walk in the ways of peace.

Courtesy of Naxos of America, Inc.
content.question: The cadence on the word “peace,” sung by the sopranos, is

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

topic.text: 4.3: Harmonic Progression, Functional Harmony, and Cadences

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
